text: @Bill_Esterson @SealeStu The PM pursued a policy of herd immunity. Covid-19 ran riot among the elderly & BAME communities, neither of whom were favourites of the PM. Keeping people working and the economy strong was the government priority. It was a policy that unecessarily cost us thousands of lives.
